datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to retro-futuristic design, steam-powered technology, and Victorian aesthetics.

columns.name: attends_steampunk_convention
columns.description: Indicates whether the participant attends an annual steampunk convention

columns.name: preference_for_communication
columns.description: Whether the participant prefers online or in-person communication

columns.name: monthly_budget_spent_on_steampunk
columns.description: Percentage of monthly budget spent on steampunk-related items

columns.name: num_of_hobbies
columns.description: Number of hobbies the participant is actively involved in

columns.name: distance_to_nearest_event
columns.description: The participant's geographical distance in kilometers to the nearest major steampunk event

columns.name: technology_fair_attendance
columns.description: Number of technology-related fairs the participant attends annually

columns.name: annual_spending_on_regular_clothing
columns.description: Annual spending on regular, non-themed clothing

columns.name: has_steampunk_credit_card
columns.description: Indicates whether the participant has a steampunk-themed credit card

columns.name: participant_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each participant

columns.name: steampunk_literature_written
columns.description: Number of steampunk-themed literary works written by the participant each year

columns.name: employment_in_creative_field
columns.description: Whether the participant is employed in a creative field such as art, design, or entertainment

columns.name: steampunk_social_media_engagement
columns.description: The participant's engagement percentile in steampunk-related social media groups.

columns.name: newsletter_subscription
columns.description: Whether the participant is subscribed to newsletters for upcoming steampunk events.

columns.name: steampunk_content_exposure
columns.description: The amount of exposure to steampunk-themed content in media, rated on a scale from 1 to 10

columns.name: years_in_subculture
columns.description: Number of years the participant has been involved in the steampunk subculture

columns.name: age_range
columns.description: The age range of the participant.

columns.name: has_steampunk_hobby
columns.description: Indicates whether the participant engages in hobbies related to steampunk culture

columns.name: num_of_themed_events_attended
columns.description: Number of steampunk-themed events attended in a year

columns.name: online_forum_participation
columns.description: Number of steampunk-related online forums the participant actively uses

columns.name: residence_type
columns.description: Type of area where the participant lives

columns.name: steampunk_art_created
columns.description: Number of steampunk-themed artworks created by the participant each year

columns.name: age_of_participant
columns.description: Age of the participant in years

columns.name: owns_steampunk_fashion_items
columns.description: Indicates whether the participant owns fashion items related to steampunk

columns.name: subculture_involvement
columns.description: Type of subculture participant is involved in

columns.name: online_steampunk_discussion_frequency
columns.description: Frequency of discussions on online forums about steampunk topics per month

queries.question: Is there a relationship between residence type, technology fair attendance, and the distance to the nearest major steampunk event according to the dataset?
queries.true_hypothesis: The distance to the nearest major steampunk event decreases by a fixed amount based on the participant's residence type, with urban residents being 300 km closer, suburban residents being 700 km closer, and others being 1500 km closer. Additionally, the distance decreases by 30 km for each technology fair attended by the participant.
